scripts.lerna:b: npm run clean && husky install && git pull && lerna bootstrap
scripts.publish:f: npm run build:f-compression && npm run scz && lerna updated && lerna publish --yes
scripts.publish:c: npm run scz && lerna updated && lerna publish --yes
scripts.publish:npm-common: nrm use npm && nrm ls && npm run publish:npm-common-only && nrm use vd && nrm ls
scripts.publish:npm-component: nrm use npm && nrm ls && npm run publish:npm-component-only && nrm use vd && nrm ls
scripts.publish:npm-framework: nrm use npm && nrm ls && npm run publish:npm-framework-only && nrm use vd && nrm ls
scripts.publish:npm: nrm use npm && nrm ls && npm run publish:npm-common-only && npm run publish:npm-component-only && npm run publish:npm-framework-only && nrm use vd && nrm ls
scripts.scz: git stage -A && npm run cz && git push
scripts.reinstall: npm run clean && npm run clean:framework && npm run clean:simple && npm run lerna:b
scripts.start:common-noCompression: npm run build:common-noCompression && npm run start
scripts.start:component-noCompression: npm run build:component-noCompression && npm run start
scripts.start:component-extra-noCompression: npm run build:component-extra-noCompression && npm run start
scripts.start:build: npm run build:common-noCompression && npm run build:component-noCompression && npm run build:component-extra-noCompression && npm run build:f-noCompression && npm run start:simple
scripts.start:h5:build: npm run build:common-noCompression && npm run build:component-noCompression && npm run build:component-extra-noCompression && npm run build:f-noCompression && npm run start:simple
scripts.build:fvp: npm run build:f && npm run build:vp
scripts.build:vp: cd packages/taro-fast-framework && npm version patch && yarn publish
scripts.build: npm run build:common-compression && npm run build:component-compression && npm run build:component-extra-compression && npm run build:f-compression && npm run build:simple
scripts.ncu:u:all: ncu -u && npm run ncu:u:rollup && npm run ncu:u:common && npm run ncu:u:component && npm run ncu:u:component-extra && npm run ncu:u:framework && npm run ncu:u:simple
scripts.ncu:all: ncu && npm run ncu:rollup && npm run ncu:common && npm run ncu:component && npm run ncu:component-extra && npm run ncu:framework && npm run ncu:simple
